nl.esciencecenter.esight.datastructures

Class GLSLAttrib

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.esight.datastructures.GLSLAttrib

  • public class GLSLAttrib
extends java.lang.Object
    GLSL attribute object, containing the necessary information to be succesfully sent to the GPU. In GLSL shaders, these attributes are referred to by the keyword "in".
    Author:
    Maarten van Meersbergen

    • Constructor Detail

      • GLSLAttrib

        public GLSLAttrib(java.nio.Buffer buffer,
          java.lang.String name,
          int numVectors,
          int vectorSize)
        Basic constructor for GLSLAttrib.
        Parameters:
        buffer - The buffer to be associated with this attribute. The size for this buffer must correspond to
        name - The GLSL name for this attribute, must correspond to the "in" variable in your GLSL shader.
        numVectors - The number of vectors to be represented by this attribute.
        vectorSize - The size (number of places) per vector.
